Description: The user attacks by draining the target's nutrients. Some of the damage dealt to the target is absorbed by the user to restore their own HP.
The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, raising its defensive stats.
The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.
The user launches razor-like wind to slash the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky.
The user attacks with a primeval power. This may also raise the user's offensive and defensive stats.
The user lunges at the target to deal damage, moving at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This also raises the user's action speed.
The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.
The user attacks the target while crying out in a startling fashion.
The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes. This lowers the target's offensive stats.
The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.
The user bites the target with viciously sharp fangs to inflict damage.
The user attacks its target with spine-chilling resentment. This may also leave the target with frostbite. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.
The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also leave the target with frostbite.
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the target. This may also leave the target with frostbite.
The user tucks in its wings and charges at a low altitude. This also damages the user.
The user attacks the target with a spray of countless bubbles.
The user vibrates to generate a damaging sound wave. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising its offensive and defensive stats.
The user tramples its target into the ground, dealing damage. This also lowers the target's action speed.
The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This also raises the user's action speed.
The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its offensive and defensive stats.
The user slashes its shell blade at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Shell splinters left behind by this attack will continue to damage the target for several turns.
The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The leftover electricity may also raise the user's offensive stats.
The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user and lowers the user's action speed.
The user fights the target up close, inflicting damage without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's defensive stats.
The target is hit with a weak telekinetic force to inflict damage.
A slashing attack with a toxic blade that may also poison the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move's power.
The user releases a horrible aura imbued with ill intent. This attack never misses.
The target is dragged into a world of total darkness that makes the target drowsy and lowers its defensive stats.
The user emits a powerful flash of light to inflict damage on the target.
The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or drowsy.
The user adopts a hard-hitting stance to increase the damage dealt by its moves by 50 percent.
A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user.
Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The recoil from this move lowers the user's offensive stats.
The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth. This attack never misses.
The user attacks with an energy-draining punch that restores the user's HP.
The user attacks with an energy-draining kiss that restores the user's HP.
The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.
The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also raises the user's action speed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power.
The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.
A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
The user bites the target with flame-cloaked fangs to deal damage. This may also leave the target with a burn.
The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target to deal damage. This may also leave the target with a burn.
The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user and may leave the target with a burn.
The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that its future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits.
The user charges at the target using every bit of its power.
A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user.
The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user's defensive stats.
The user attacks with relentless intensity. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.
Through some mysterious power, this move changes type to deal supereffective damage to the target.
The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.
The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind.
The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
The target is attacked with a powerful beam.
The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target drowsy.
The user hurls a chunk of ice at the target, then becomes fixated on using this move.
The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target with frostbite.
The user bites the target with cold-infused fangs to deal damage. This may also leave the target with frostbite.
The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target with frostbite.
The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This also raises the user's action speed.
The user attacks by crashing large icicles onto the target.
The user attacks with a gust of freezing air.
The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.
The user hardens its body's surface like iron, raising its defensive stats.
The user slams the target with its steel-hard head.
The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move's type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user last interacted with.
The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The recoil from this move lowers the user's offensive stats.
The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.
The user attacks by draining the target's blood. Some of the damage dealt to the target is absorbed by the user to restore their own HP.
The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The user heals its own status conditions and restores its HP. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.
The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This also raises the user's action speed.
The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.
The user envelops the target in a maelstrom of fire. This also leaves the target with a burn.
Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target to inflict damage.
The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.
Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's offensive stats.
The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage.
The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to inflict damage. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.
The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.
The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's offensive stats.
The user strengthens itself with a mysterious power. If it excels in offense, its offensive stats are raised. If it excels in defense, its defensive stats are raised.
The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts, raising the user's offensive stats.
The user slashes the target the instant the target lowers its guard. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The user sprays ink in the target's face to inflict damage. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.
The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise the user's offensive and defensive stats.
The user attacks by going on a rampage, then becomes fixated on using this move.
The user attacks the target at full power. The recoil from this move lowers the user's offensive stats.
The user attacks the target by scattering petals, then becomes fixated on using this move.
Sharp spikes are shot at the target. Spike splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.
The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's offensive stats.
The user sprays a cloud of toxic gas that poisons the target.
The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
The user scatters a cloud of toxic powder that poisons the target.
The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.
The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also leave the target with frostbite.
The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.
The user swaps its offensive and defensive stats.
The target is hit with a strong telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This may also raise the user's defensive stats.
The user lunges at the target to deal damage, moving at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This also raises the user's action speed.
The user rampages and spews vicious flames to inflict damage on the target, then becomes fixated on using this move.
The user regenerates its cells to restore its own HP.
The user restores its own HP but also becomes drowsy.
The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time.
Large boulders are hurled at the target to inflict damage.
The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The user rolls into the target to deal damage, then becomes fixated on using this move.
The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user's HP.
The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This also leaves the target with a burn.
The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The user causes an explosion to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user.
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target to deal damage. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The user cloaks itself in darkness as it attacks. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.
The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This also raises the user's action speed.
The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, raising its defensive stats. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.
The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise the user's offensive and defensive stats.
The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The user scatters a cloud of sleep-inducing powder that makes the target drowsy.
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target to deal damage. This may also poison the target.
The user attacks by crying out as if it's ranting about something. This also lowers the target's offensive stats.
The user restores its own HP.
The user tears the target along with the space around it. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target to deal damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
The user lays a trap of spikes at the target's feet. The spikes left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.
The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...
The user scatters a burst of spores that makes the target drowsy.
The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This move's additional effects depend on the user's form.
The user launches countless stones at the target. Stone splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.
The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.
The user swings its stone axes at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Stone splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.
The user stabs the target with sharpened stones. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also damages the user a little.
The user struggles against the target, dealing damage. This also lowers the target's offensive stats.
The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.
Star-shaped rays are shot at the target. This attack never misses.
A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This raises the user's offensive stats.
A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
The user lifts its spirits, healing its own status conditions and raising its offensive and defensive stats.
The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if there is any able to battle. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
The user bites the target with electrified fangs to deal damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
The user attacks the target with a jolt of electricity. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.
The user attacks the target with a strong electric blast. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also leave the target with a burn, paralysis, or frostbite.
The user delivers an axe kick, then fires three arrows. This raises the chance of its future attacks landing critical hits and also lowers the target's defensive stats.
The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the target.
The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid to inflict damage. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.
The user performs a dance to usher in victory. This raises the user's offensive and defensive stats and increases the damage dealt by the user's moves by 50 percent.
The user electrifies itself and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user and may leave the target with paralysis.
The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This attack never misses.
The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user and raises the user's action speed.
The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user and may leave the target with paralysis.
The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user.
The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target.
